resources.string:
VSB will put a semi transparent virtuel button at the bottom of your screen. It will be there at anytime, even when the keyboard is open. So be careful when typing. The button has several functions:

(Double) Touch:
trigger a regular \"home button\" press.

Swipe left:
trigger a regular \"back button\" press.

Swipe right:
trigger a regular \"recent button\" press.

Swipe up:
open notifications.

This app is a strongly modified version of the great app \"VirtualSoftKeys\" developed from \"erttyy8821\". It is also licensed under the Apache License. You can find the source code on Github: https://github.com/erttyy8821/VirtualSoftKeys
Here you can configure the size of VSB. You can also make the button invisible and hide the launcher icon of VSB. To apply changes you have to restart the service.
In order for app to work properly you need to allow the permissions to draw over other apps (Settings > Apps > Advanced > Draw over other apps).
And then enable the Accessibility service (Settings > Accessibility > VSB).
Please allow draw over apps permission
Please allow this permission first, and select VSB in accessibility
Please allow draw over apps permission first
Turn VSB\'s service on or off, if you do not do this you cannot use the app.
The application icon will be removed from the system\'s applications list. In order to restore the icon, please uninstall and reinstall the app.
